Title: Alley had first class, broke 54-year-old record
Summary: Brother James Alley had first class, broke 54-year-old record . Alley was navigating through herculean task of academic programme at University of Benin . His commitment and dedication to God paid off...

Title: Blessed are the pure in heart
Summary: Purity of heart is an attribute of God, hence He is always interested on the state of the heart of man in relation to its cleanliness and purpose . A pure heart holds nothing against anybody, as it is always in the state in which God created it .

Title: The never-forgetting,  promise-keeping God
Summary: The book of Deuteronomy Chapter 7 is one of the series of sermons that Moses delivered to the people of God as they were preparing to enter into the Promised Land .

Title: FCTA to construct additional bus terminals in Bwari, Gwagwalada – Wike
Summary: Mr Nyesom Wike said the FCT Administration will construct additional bus terminals in Bwari and Gwagwalada . Wike disclosed this when he inspected the dualisation of Ushafa to War College and Check Point Road .

Title: 2027: North West APC, governors endorse Tinubu for reelection
Summary: The All Progressives Congress (APC) North West Zone has risen with one voice from its stakeholders meeting held in Kaduna on Saturday . The meeting had in attendance the National Chairman of the National Council of the APC .

Title: Democracy in Africa and the dangers of a judicial selectorate, by Chidi Odinkalu
Summary: Uganda’s Supreme Court convened to begin adjudication of the disputes over the presidential election that occurred the previous month in the country . Voting took place on 23 February, on 25 February, the Electoral Commission announced the results giving the incumbent, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, 59.28% of votes .

Title: ALLIANCE:With right strategy, APC will become history in 2027 — Nwosu
Summary: National Chairman of the African Democratic Congress, Chief Ralph Okey Nwosu, speaks on the looming Anambra governorship election and the chances of a united opposition against President Bola Tinubu come 2027 .

Summary: Ahead of 2027: One-party state tensions grip Nigeria . There will be no alternative to those in power as they do whatever they like . impunity reigns .

Summary: Executive Secretary of the Nigeria Police Trust Fund, Mohammed Sheidu, shares his thoughts with BIODUN BUSARI on the hurdles facing the organisation, its achievements, among other things .

Title: ‘Excessive use of perfumes may cause cancer’
Summary: Leading medical experts have warned that the excessive use of perfumes, deodorants and body sprays containing harmful chemicals could cause cancer to the users . The experts also stated that males who used such products were also at risk of fertility problems, diabetes and cancer, among other ailments . Summary: Naseer Abiona was diagnosed with severe hearing loss when he was two years old . Title: Why buildings collapse
Summary: Nigerian Institution of Civil Engineers and the Lagos State Materials Testing Laboratory recently called for adherence to building regulations to prevent structural collapses .
